column5: I can't peg the exact time and place I sadly realized my mind is more than willing to do like putting up drywall but the body refuses to  do those things that took me minutes in the past. I can't even carry 1/2 sheet of drywall solo now. The frustrating  thing is trying to help my wife do something construction related  that I know is the correct way but she insists she can do it better "her" way. I know there is more than one way to skin a Cat but using a rock to skin it is just plain wrong. Then after 30 minutes of her trying it her way it took 3 minutes doing it the right way "my way." Ohhhh man!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Her way is always right, even if you have to fix it.
I was going else where with the title. There is pills for that.
I have learned in my life time so far , Happy Wife =  Happy Life. 39 years of marriage  is a milestone these days.
Misleading thread title of the month!!
